00032   const uint32_t READAHEAD_BUFFER_SIZE = 131072;
00033 }
00034 
00037 CommitLogBlockStream::CommitLogBlockStream(Filesystem *fs) : m_fs(fs), m_fd(-1), m_cur_offset(0), m_file_length(0),m_block_buffer(BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog::LENGTH) {
00038 }

00040 CommitLogBlockStream::CommitLogBlockStream(Filesystem *fs, const String &log_dir, const String &fragment) : m_fs(fs), m_fd(-1), m_cur_offset(0), m_file_length(0), m_block_buffer(BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog::LENGTH) {
00041   load(log_dir, fragment);
00042 }
00043 
00044 CommitLogBlockStream::~CommitLogBlockStream() {
00045   close();
00046 }
00047 void CommitLogBlockStream::load(const String &log_dir, const String &fragment) {
00048   if (m_fd != -1)
00049     close();
00050   m_fragment = fragment;
00051   m_fname = log_dir + fragment;
00052   m_cur_offset = 0;
00053   m_file_length = m_fs->length(m_fname);
00054   m_fd = m_fs->open_buffered(m_fname, READAHEAD_BUFFER_SIZE, 2);
00055 }
00056 
00057 void CommitLogBlockStream::close() {
00058   if (m_fd != -1) {
00059     try {
00060       m_fs->close(m_fd);
00061     }
00062     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00063       HT_ERRORF("Problem closing file %s - %s (%s)",
00064                 m_fname.c_str(), e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00065     }
00066     m_fd = -1;
00067   }
00068 }
00069 
00070 bool CommitLogBlockStream::next(CommitLogBlockInfo *infop, BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog *header) {
00071   uint32_t nread;
00072 
00073   assert(m_fd != -1);
00074 
00075   if (m_cur_offset >= m_file_length)
00076     return false;
00077 
00078   memset(infop, 0, sizeof(CommitLogBlockInfo));
00079   infop->file_fragment = m_fragment.c_str();
00080   infop->start_offset = m_cur_offset;
00081 
00082   if ((infop->error = load_next_valid_header(header)) != Error::OK) {
00083     infop->end_offset = m_cur_offset;
00084     return true;
00085   }
00086 
00087   m_cur_offset += BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog::LENGTH;
00088 
00089   // check for truncation
00090   if ((m_file_length - m_cur_offset) < header->get_data_zlength()) {
00091     infop->end_offset = m_file_length;
00092     infop->error = Error::RANGESERVER_TRUNCATED_COMMIT_LOG;
00093     m_cur_offset = m_file_length;
00094     return true;
00095   }
00096 
00097   m_block_buffer.ensure(BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog::LENGTH + header->get_data_zlength());
00098 
00099   nread = m_fs->read(m_fd, m_block_buffer.ptr, header->get_data_zlength());
00100 
00101   HT_EXPECT(nread == header->get_data_zlength(), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00102 
00103   m_block_buffer.ptr += nread;
00104   m_cur_offset += nread;
00105   infop->end_offset = m_cur_offset;
00106   infop->block_ptr = m_block_buffer.base;
00107   infop->block_len = m_block_buffer.fill();
00108 
00109   return true;
00110 }
00111

00113 
00116 int CommitLogBlockStream::load_next_valid_header(BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog *header) {
00117   uint32_t nread;
00118   size_t remaining = BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog::LENGTH;
00119   try {
00120     nread = m_fs->read(m_fd, m_block_buffer.base,
00121                        BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog::LENGTH);
00122     HT_EXPECT(nread == BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog::LENGTH, -1);
00123 
00124     m_block_buffer.ptr = m_block_buffer.base;
00125     header->decode((const uint8_t **)&m_block_buffer.ptr, &remaining);
00126   }
00127   catch (Exception &e) {
00128     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00129     return e.code();
00130   }
00131   return Error::OK;
00132 }
